About Swingy

Swingy is an amazing app that finds the kind of event and social meet ups with friends that is suited for your moods.


Do more
Find popular events, unique local experiences and events just for you.


Get together

See where your friends are going so you never miss out on the fun.

Save a tree

Just show your ticket on your phone to get in.


Get tickets fast

Pay with your phone and secure your spot.


Host your own

Easily check guests in at the door.
